text: The 2019–20 CEV Challenge Cup was the 40th edition of the CEV Challenge Cup tournament. 40 teams from 28 countries were participating in the competition. The tournament has been cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Participating teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:left" |+ ! Rank !! Country !! Number of teams !! Lycurgus Groningen |- |align="center"|13||||align="center"|1|| Hapoel Yoav Kfar Saba |- |align="center"|15||||align="center"|1|| Stroitel Minsk |- |align="center"|17||||align="center"|1|| Omonia Nicosia |- |align="center"|18||||align="center"|2|| Fonte Bastardo Açores, Sporting CP |- |align="center"|20||||align="center"|1|| Mladost Ribola Kaštela |- |align="center"|21||||align="center"|1|| Hebar Pazardzhik |- |align="center"|22||||align="center"|1|| VKP SPU Nitra |- |align="center"|22||||align="center"|1|| Calcit Volley Kamnik |- |align="center"|24||||align="center"|2|| Pärnu VK, Saaremaa VC |- |align="center"|25||||align="center"|1|| Gentofte Volley |- |align="center"|27||||align="center"|1|| K.V. Luboteni Ferizaj |- |align="center"|28||||align="center"|1|| Aluron Virtu CMC Zawiercie |- |align="center"|30||||align="center"|1|| Budućnost Podgorica |- |align="center"|31||||align="center"|3|| Fino Kaposvar, Pénzügyőr Budapest, VRC Kazincbarcika |- |align="center"|32||||align="center"|1|| Unicaja Costa de Almeria |- |align="center"|34||||align="center"|2|| Erzeni, Partizani |- |align="center"|35||||align="center"|1|| CHEV Diekirch |- |align="center"|51||||align="center"|1|| Vardar Skopje |- |align="center"|55||||align="center"|1|| Linköpings VC |- |} == Format == Qualification Phase (Knock-out with Home and Away Matches): 1st Round (if needed) → 2nd Round Main Phase (Knock-out with Home and Away Matches): 1/16 Finals → 1/8 Finals→1/4 Finals Final Phase (Knock-out with Home and Away Matches): Semi-Finals → Final Aggregate score is counted as follows: 3 points for 3–0 or 3–1 wins, 2 points for 3–2 win, 1 point for 2–3 loss. In case the teams are tied after two legs, a Golden Set is played immediately at the completion of the second leg. ==Qualification phase== ===2nd Round=== |} ====First leg==== |} ====Second leg==== |} *The match between Erzeni and Partizani has been postponed from 27 November to 4 December due to an earthquake that occurred in Albania ==Main phase== ===16th Finals=== |} ====First leg==== |} ====Second leg==== |} ===8th Finals=== |} ====First leg==== |} ====Second leg==== |} ===4th Finals=== |} ====First leg==== |} ====Second leg==== |} ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:CEV Challenge Cup CEV Challenge Cup CEV Challenge Cup CEV Challenge Cup
